text: (Yemwe Bayisilamu) muvuge muti "Twemeye Allah nibyo twahishuriwe, (ari na byo) byahishuriwe Ibrahimu, Ismail, Is’haqa, Yaqub n’urubyaro rwe, ibyahishuriwe Musa, ibyahishuriwe Isa ndetse n’ibyahishuriwe abahanuzi biturutse kwaNyagasani wabo. Nta n’umwe tuvangura muri bo kandi ni we twicishaho bugufi
